notes: This map illustrates satellite-detected damage and destruction in the town of Sankhu, Kathmandu Valley, Nepal. Located northeast of Kathmandu city, Sankhu was significantly impacted by the 25 April 2015 earthquake in Nepal. Using satellite imagery acquired 27 April 2015 UNITAR / UNOSAT identified a total of 300 affected structures. Approximately 166 of these were destroyed, 97 severely damaged, and 37 moderately damaged. This is a preliminary analysis and has not yet been validated in the field. Please send ground feedback to UNITAR / UNOSAT.
